rows.name: Subitizing

block1_text.eng:
This will talk about resources involved with a subitizing task.

It might start with a specific dot card and ask the teacher to think of two or three ways of counting it. Bring the teacher into the learning, don't just be explaining these examples to them.

rows.block1_text:

rows.name: Doubles

block1_text.eng: This will talk about teaching about doubles. Maybe tie in Mike's Birds on a Wire example of having 2 3 5 2 5 3 on a wire and adding it up by identifying doubles.

rows.block1_text: This will talk about teaching about doubles. Maybe tie in Mike's Birds on a Wire example of having 2 3 5 2 5 3 on a wire and adding it up by identifying doubles.

rows.name: Rich Tasks

block1_text.eng: This will talk about what's involved in working with Rich Tasks.

rows.name: Routines

block1_text.eng: Talk about how to fill in 2 to 10 minute gaps in the day.
